PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03332018-03-26,  TC,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Atlantic Pilotage Tariff Regulations, 1996
PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS, 1996 in order to enable the Authority to meet its mandate to operate, in the interest of safety, an efficient pilotage service within the Atlantic region, while ensuring the financial self-sufficiency of individual ports and avoiding cross-subsidization.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0054 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Atlantic Pilotage Tariff Regulations, 1996
precis: Regulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS, 1996 in order to enable the Authority to meet its mandate to operate, in the interest of safety, an efficient pilotage service within the Atlantic region, while ensuring the financial self-sufficiency of individual ports and avoiding cross-subsidization.
